attributes.action: help our neighbours to understand why we have so many dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everywhere we move to,our neighbours complain about our dogs and our huskies. Today we were threatend and punched by our neighbour complaining that we had so many huskies and that he wanted them removed and the kennels removed because they look like wolves and scare people. He couldnt understand why we have so many dogs.and told us that if we dont get rid of our pets and ourr working dogs then we will be in big trouble. he said he wouldnt care if we were breeding them but because were not he said its too many. even the dogs on the other farms bark constently. he just hates the way our dogs look. please sign the petiton and let everyone know that have a lot of dogs is fine when they are propery looked after.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
